sik.client.user.services
Class TextFileBuilder

java.lang.Object
  sik.client.user.services.TextFileBuilder

public class TextFileBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

Class which constructs a simple String based on a given input to be written to a file in order for it to be used by the bluetooth panel in this system to send to a bluetooth device

Author:
Jamie Brindle (06352322) - Manchester Metropolitan University
